title: Germany: bumper pay deal boosts consumption hopes
text:
Germany: bumper pay deal boosts consumption hopes 4:02pm BST - 01:44 
German unions and employers have ended marathon pay talks with a phased agreement to boost the pay of more than 2 million public sector workers by some 7.5 percent over two-and-a-half years. As David Pollard reports, it could boost consumer spending.
